sourcesContent:
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-login', templateUrl: './login.component.html', styleUrls: ['./login.component.css'], }) export class LoginComponent implements OnInit { type: string = 'password'; isText: boolean = false; eyeIcon: string = 'fa-eye'; constructor() {} ngOnInit(): void {} hideShowPass() { this.isText = !this.isText; this.isText ? (this.eyeIcon = 'fa-eye-slash') : (this.eyeIcon = 'fa-eye'); this.isText ? (this.type = 'text') : (this.type = 'password'); } }
